1. Assistant City Manager

Assistant City Manager
======================

The Assistant City Manager is responsible for administering the affairs of the city in accordance with the City Charter, City Council policies and State and Federal Laws. The Assistant City Manager supports the City Manager and supervises and manages the operations of the Police Department and Fire Rescue.
